profile:
Milestone Bath Experts’ is a local Quinte area business specializing in bathroom renovations of all sizes, from partial to full-scale renovations. We offer solutions for all aspects of bathroom renovations including bathtub re-glazing, acrylic tub liners and custom bathwall systems, new bathtubs or tub to shower conversion, walk-in bathtubs and much more. We truly offer all possible solutions, and you can choose which option fits your particular situation, home style, and budget.  Did we mention AFFORDABLE?  Because we are highly organized and specialized, you will be surprised at how affordable getting your bathroom renovated can be…  Give us a call for a free in-home quotation at a time of day that suits your busy schedule.

Established in 1996, we pride ourselves on having professional and knowledgeable staff from quotation to project completion, who are willing to assist you through all aspects of your project. Milestone Bath Experts’ proven ability to service the needs of our valued customers is evident by the number of referrals we receive on an ongoing basis. You can be assured that we will be here to serve your needs for today and in the future.

Our commitment to provide you the highest quality materials, installation, expertise, and service truly make us the “Bathroom Renovation Specialists”.

No matter where you live, Milestone Bath Experts’ will be able to meet and exceed your bathroom renovation need…just give us a call!



What Makes Us Different
At Milestone Bath Experts’ we start things off right by providing an experienced estimator with all of the knowledge to assist you with accurate information and options. Our philosophy of offering all possible solutions lets you, the homeowner, make the final decision on what suits your home and budget. This ensures a no-pressure, high value experience every time.

As Milestone Bath Experts’ offers over nine thousand products, we bring our state of the art electronic catalogue right to your home so you can choose the best and latest fixtures for your particular situation. On time, knowledgeable, no pressure… every time.

At Milestone Bath Experts’ we recognize the importance of a flawless installation. Even the best products will not last if not properly installed, so we focus on factory training, using only skilled tradespeople, and finishing up every job with a Customer Satisfaction Questionnaire. Our best referral source is our installation success.

Fully equipped installation vehicles carrying a multitude of supplies for the job, ensures that we are prepared for any surprises that may pop up during the installation of your new bathroom fixtures. Never covering up the hidden stuff is all part of the commitment from the Milestone Bath Experts’ Installation Team.

Give us a call to arrange a time for us to have a look at your bathroom needs, and to provide you with the best options for your specific situation.


Check us out here:
www.milestonebath.com
www.bellevillekitchens.com
www.bellevillebathreno.ca
